use.flag: Include HasCallStack constraint on calls unchecked calls
Fail unchecked calls when they are called (rather than when the result is evaluated)

pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package provides an EDSL for calling JavaScript that can be used both from GHCJS and GHC. When using GHC the application is run using Warp and WebSockets to drive a small JavaScipt helper.
